questions.question: How Do I Add Friends On Mezon?
questions.answer: To add friends on Mezon, go to the Friends page and enter a Mezon username in the 'Add Friend' section. You can manage your friend list with filters such as All, Online, Pending (friend requests), and Block (blocked users). You can also see your friends' online status in real time and view what they're doing through the Activity section, which shows if they're coding, listening to music, or gaming.

questions.question: What Messaging Features Does Mezon Offer?
questions.answer: Mezon offers comprehensive messaging features including sending text, emojis, stickers, images, videos, files, and voice recordings; pinning important messages for quick access; creating small group chats with up to 10 members; making 1-on-1 or group voice and video calls  in HD quality; screen sharing during calls; and searching messages. All communication features are completely free, with no limits.

questions.question: How Do Voice And Video Calls Work On Mezon?
questions.answer: Mezon allows you to make 1-on-1 or  small‑group voice and video calls directly within the app. During calls, you can turn your microphone or camera on/off anytime, share your screen, and enjoy stable connections with HD video and low-latency voice. When someone calls you, your phone or computer will ring just like a regular call. All calls are free run over your internet connection.

questions.question: Is My Communication On Mezon Private And Secure?
questions.answer: Yes, Mezon prioritizes privacy and security. You can only message people who are your friends or share at least one Clan with you, preventing spam and ensuring a private space. Messages are synchronized across Web, Desktop, and Mobile platforms in real-time, so you never miss anything. When your group becomes more active, you can upgrade it into a Clan to unlock additional features like multiple channels and admin permissions.
